*** Controls (Touch or Buttons) ***
Button Control:
Left / Right / Fire buttons on bottom of screen (my personal preference)


Autofire: Just use the new autofire button to switch it on or off


Drag (Touch) Controls:
1 Finger Mode: Touch bottom screen to have ship follow your finger

2 Finger Mode: Touch bottom screen to have ship follow your finger and tap screen above the ship to shoot.

2 Finger Side Mode: Move and shoot ship gun by pressing each side of the screen

Includes the tricky Alien Dodging from the classic and "Chase the Flagship"

Get your Highest Score on a Global High-score Table!
Works well on small or large screens
